45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "Indeed there is a Surah in the Qur'an of thirty Ayat, which intercedes for a man until he is forgiven. It is [Surah] Tabarak Alladhi Biyadihil-Mulk

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سُورَةِ الْمُلْكِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About [The Virtue Of] Surat Al-Mulk
